fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Combust: When you die, choose to privately deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to a target at the end of the phase. Must be chosen by the following phase of your death. 
- Arcane Read: Learn 3 non-King playerâ€™s names. One (75% chance), or none of them (25% chance), truly do not win with you. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Double Strike: Pick a non-special attacking card in your hand. Double it (without modifiers) and send both toward a single player of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]  
- Summon: Draw 2 non-duel won cards of your choice at the end of this phase. Replaces your regular draw. Cannot be affected by Replenish! Max 1 special. [1 use, Unique] 
- Firestrike: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
